Reviews.Content: A Great Family Hotel A few days ago we were in a big trip to Italy and this is one of the good hotels that we stayed. Don't get me wrong it isn't the 5-star, luxurious, downtown kind of type hotel. In fact it is situated in an italian neighbourhood 10 min (w the bus) from the historical centre of Florence.What was great about it, were the family that run it. So sympathetic and helpful people! They helped us in any way they could and always with a big smile.We paid 75 euros for a double room that had en suite a big bathroom (no tub) w all the toiletries available, AC, TV and breakfast.The beds were very comfortable, the decoration simple but elegant, daily room service and a plain yet pretty adequate breakfast.Another great thing was that we could park our car just outside the hotel.The bus station stop is within a 3 min walk from the hotel.The only con was that the room looked on a rather busy road. That was solved, though, with the use of the AC during the night.I highly recommend this hotel and i will definitely stay there again as i intend to revisit Florence very soon!
Reviews.Author: Calliope74
